level.heading: Employment of minors under 18 years of age in certain occupations prohibited.
level.text: No minor under 18 years of age shall be employed, permitted, or suffered to work at operating any freight or nonautomatic elevator, or in any quarry, tunnel, or excavation.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-68, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 32-201.
